name: Dungeons and Axes
description:
Dungeons and Axes is a small roguelike inspired in Downwell and Undertale  that is played only with the mouse. You are a little goblin and  your objective is to overcome 5 stages where there will be enemies that will not make it so easy for you. Improve your skills as you progress and fight the final BOSS to win.

I recommend playing the downloadable versions for a better experience.

The game was created in just 3 days for Vimjam2, so if you find any bug, report it to me as quickly as possible.

The theme of the jam was "on the edge" and the game had to have a boss.

That's all, if you like the game you can leave me a comment, that encourages me to continue making games, thanks for everything :)
